thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 22 of 3593
thread.title: Ryan

author: Ryan
title: Ryan
text: I've ordered almost 20 books off of Thriftbooks recently and everything has come to me in wonderful condition. Even they're "acceptable" copies have arrived unscathed and in a good quality condition. The website is easy to navigate, they offer free shipping over only $10 and every $50 you spend earns you a $5 off coupon towards your next purchase! Fast shipping, friendly customer service & great selection of books. I'd recommend this site to anyone!
